name: KP Sharma Oli
commitment: Build floodlights in TU Cricket Stadium
details: Prime Minister KP Sharma Oli announced the plan to install floodlights at the TU Cricket Stadium, aiming to enhance Nepal's cricket infrastructure.

evidence.description: Screenshot of KP Oli's Facebook post

name: Pradip Paudel
details: Health Minister Pradip Paudel committed to implementing a new system to reduce waiting times and remove long lines from hospitals across Nepal.

evidence.description: एक महिनाभित्र संघीय अस्पतालहरूमा लाइन बस्नु नपर्ने व्यवस्था गर्ने मन्त्री पौडेलको प्रतिबद्धता
